Welcome to SOFA’s documentation!¶

  • License

Description¶

SOFA is a small open-source GUI program that lets you analyse AFM data easily.

Input Output

It supports IBW (Igor binary wave) and hdf5 files.

Examples¶

In SOFA several test datasets are included. You can find them in /sofa/test_data

Installation¶

SOFA can either be installed via setup.py or as executable, which can be found on the release page in the GitHub repository.

Contribution¶

If you have any issues or want to contribute to SOFA yourself please use the GitHub site of SOFA. You can also contact us via sofa@bam.de

License¶
